comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Eleven o'clock... At this very moment, the flag atop Old Main is dead-to-the-air. Not a whisper of movement. Mark my words though, as soon as SB scurrys out of his office at noon with his bike over his shoulder, that flag will look like it's been starched and straightened. Our own Puxatony Phil seems to be not only the bellwether of gale-force winds, but the catalyst as well. Maybe he should wear a disguise.
